subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=仟-financial}}
Unknown. {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} noticed similar-looking [[Mon-Khmer]] lexical items, though their initials and finals do not match Old Chinese; compare {{cog|vi|nghìn}} and {{cog|omx|lṅim}} (whence {{cog|mnw|လ္ၚီ|tr=ŋìm}}), all meaning "thousand". Compare also {{cog|lic-pro|*C-ŋin}}.
